alert.note: Alert for Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 7:40AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...Heavy snow will impact portions of southern St. Lawrence County through 845 AM EST... At 738 AM EST, heavy snow was reported along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Fowler to 12 miles southwest of Oswegatchie to 10 miles west of Big Moose. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Visibility less than a half mile. A quick accumulation of snow up to an inch possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Low visibility will pose a hazard to motorists. Locations impacted include... Gouverneur, Ogdensburg, Oswegatchie, De Kalb, Fowler, Degrasse, Edwardsville, Hermon, Heuvelton, Richville, Hammond, Cranberry Lake, Star Lake, Morristown, Rensselaer Falls, Russell, Fine, De Peyster, Rossie and Pitcairn.
info.instruction: Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence
